nodes.title: Artificer
nodes.shortSummary: aliases: ArtificersArtificers employ magical tinkering to create and improve [[Magic Items]].Some notable Artificers in this Campaign:[[Horatio]]Many of the [[Gnome|Gnomes]] at [[Sootwall Observatory]], among which [[1st Observer Orxim Pebblebeard]], [[2nd Observer Calric Whittlefist]], [[7th Observer Jorfan Billowgrin]].

nodes.title: Barbarian
nodes.shortSummary: Barbarians have learned to channel their [[Rage]] to reach unprecedented levels of power and even shrug of major injuries.Some notable Barbarians in this Campaign:[[Thorin]][[Alaric]][[Gortag Crushface]][[Sir Dixon Fire]]

nodes.title: Bard
nodes.shortSummary: aliases: BardsBards complement their substantial magical powers and martial prowess with musical talent that can inspire their allies and make their enemies cower in fear.Some notable Bards in this Campaign:[[Buttercup]][[Shank]]

nodes.title: Class
nodes.shortSummary: aliases: ClassesThe available classes:[[Artificer]][[Barbarian]][[Bard]][[Cleric]][[Druid]][[Fighter]][[Monk]][[Paladin]][[Ranger]][[Rogue]][[Sorcerer]][[Warlock]][[Wizard]]

nodes.title: Cleric
nodes.shortSummary: aliases: Clerics, Priest, PriestsClerics are dedicated to a [[Deity]] and serve them with a godly favor.Able to hold their own as well as throw around priestly magic and heal party members, they are a force to be reckoned with.Some notable

nodes.title: Druid
nodes.shortSummary: aliases: DruidsDruids are one with nature, trying to prevent order and civilization to take over nature.Some notable Druids in this Campaign:[[Hera]][[John]][[Reidoth]][[Sir Dixon Fire]]

nodes.title: Fighter
nodes.shortSummary: Trained in using all manners of weapons and armor, fighters are a force to be reckoned with on the battlefield.Some notable Fighters in this Campaign:[[Drathuul]][[Paxton Umbra]][[Bavon]][[Sir Dozak the Magnificent]]

nodes.title: Monk
nodes.shortSummary: Monks use a variety of martial arts fueled by their [[Ki]] energy. They are formidable opponents and may be quite hard to take down.Some notable Monks in this Campaign:[[Zatarra]][[Sam Alderleaf]]

nodes.title: Paladin
nodes.shortSummary: aliases: PaladinsPaladins are holy warriors, sworn to an [[Oath]], ideal or [[Deity]].Some notable Paladins in this Campaign:[[Sildar Hallwinter]][[Lynxakasendalor Ghesh]][[Vheidin]][[Castle-8]][[Freya]]

nodes.title: Rage
nodes.shortSummary: Rage is a [[Barbarian]] ability which makes them oblivious to the damage dealt to them. It makes a [[Barbarian]] enter a Martial Trance in which nothing exists besides the anger and Rage towards the enemies at hand. [[Barbarian|Barbarians]] in Rage

nodes.title: Ranger
nodes.shortSummary: aliases: RangersTrained as hunters and proficient in tracking their targets, rangers keep on their trails through varying conditions.Some notable Rangers in this Campaign:[[Orsik]]

nodes.title: Rogue
nodes.shortSummary: Keeping to the shadows, an unseen rogue is akin to a death sentence.Some notable Rogues in this Campaign:[[Morthos]][[Mac Hiavelli]][[Exilian]][[Navani]][[Bill]]

nodes.title: Sorcerer

nodes.title: Warlock
nodes.shortSummary: aliases: Warlocks, OccultWarlocks have made a [[Pact]] with an otherworldly [[Patron]] who gives them powers in return for their services.Some notable Warlocks in this Campaign:[[Jacob]]

nodes.title: Wizard
nodes.shortSummary: aliases: WizardsWizards are book-taught spellcasters who have spent many years studying in order to perfect their craft.They carry around a [[Spellbook]] containing their spells and are quite versatile as a result.Some notable Wizards in this Campaign:[[Enphine]]

nodes.title: Bahamut
nodes.shortSummary: Bahamut is the [[Dragon]] [[Deity|God]] of good and a [[Deity#Lesser Deities|Lesser Deity]]. He is the god of all good, Metallic [[Dragon|Dragons]], wisdom and the wind.#TODO

nodes.title: Deity
